team.name: DOOMFIST
team.description: Doomfist is the calculating leader of Talon, a terrorist organization and paramilitary force that works in direct opposition to Overwatch.

team.name: BAPTISTE
team.description: An elite combat medic and ex-Talon operative, Baptiste now uses his skills to help those whose lives have been impacted by war.

team.name: LÚCIO
team.description: Lúcio is an international celebrity who inspires social change through his music and activism.

team.name: TRACER
team.description: The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

team.name: WIDOWMAKER
team.description: Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse.

team.name: ANA
team.description: One of the founding members of Overwatch, Ana uses her skills and expertise to defend her home and the people she cares for.

team.name: KIRIKO
team.description: As Miko of the Kanezaka shrine and daughter of the Shimada's former swordmaster, Kiriko Kamori channels both her spiritual and ninja skills to heal her fractured city.

team.name: GENJI
team.description: The cyborg ninja Genji Shimada has made peace with the augmented body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.
team.origin: Hanamura, Japan (formerly), Shambali Monastery, Nepal (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

team.name: HANZO
team.description: Mastering his skills as a bowman and an assassin, Hanzo Shimada strives to prove himself as a warrior without peer.

team.name: JUNKER QUEEN
team.description: Armed with her axe, Carnage, and her electromagnetic gauntlet, the cutthroat leader of the Junkers is on a mission to rule the world.

team.name: MERCY
team.description: A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Dr. Angela Ziegler is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace.

team.name: MOIRA
team.description: Equal parts brilliant and controversial, scientist Moira O'Deorain is on the cutting edge of genetic engineering, searching for a way to rewrite the fundamental building blocks of life.

team.name: ORISA
team.description: Built from parts of one of Numbani's short-lived OR15 defense robots, Orisa is the city's newest protector, though she still has much to learn.

team.name: TRACER
team.description: The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

team.name: JUNKER QUEEN
team.description: Armed with her axe, Carnage, and her electromagnetic gauntlet, the cutthroat leader of the Junkers is on a mission to rule the world.

team.name: JUNKRAT
team.description: Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed demolitionist who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

team.name: SOLDIER: 76
team.description: The target of an international manhunt, the vigilante known as Soldier: 76 wages a personal war to expose the truth behind Overwatch's collapse.

team.name: SIGMA
team.description: Brilliant astrophysicist Dr. Siebren de Kuiper's life changed forever when an experiment gone wrong gave him the ability to control gravity; now, Talon manipulates him to their own ends.
team.origin: The Hague, Netherlands (formerly), International Space Station (formerly)

team.name: TORBJÖRN
team.description: At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjörn Lindholm.

team.name: CASSIDY
team.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, the outlaw Cole Cassidy doles out justice on his own terms.
team.origin: Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

team.name: BASTION
team.description: Once a frontline combatant in the devastating Omnic Crisis, this curious Bastion unit now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity.

team.name: BRIGITTE
team.description: No longer sitting on the sidelines, Brigitte Lindholm has taken up arms to defend those in need of protection.

team.name: D.VA
team.description: D.Va is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland.
team.origin: MEKA Base, Busan, South Korea (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

team.name: PHARAH
team.description: Fareeha Amari's commitment to duty runs in her blood. She comes from a long line of highly decorated soldiers and burns with the desire to serve with honor.
